body: Guys i know i said to you guys i left and everyone did know that<br id="null"><br id="null">The story is so SIMPLE<br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null">i left Because my Girl was in the Hospital (Hit by a car while drunk)<br id="null"><br id="null">1 day Later Her dad died<br id="null">and i was Scared because she almost DIDNT make Christmas!<br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null">SO PLEASE DONT ASK ME INGAME WHY I SAID I LEFT<br id="null">or i will alert ANY SR MOD  OR ADMIN ON SKYPE!<br id="null"><br id="null">

replies.body:
The forums are not a place for personal updates. Discussions surrounding personal updates, accomplishments or events are frowned upon as they are meant to be inclusive rather than oriented around a single person.

My condolences, have a merry Christmas (or whichever you celebrate).
